buffs.description: Increases all abilities (attack/defense/HP) of units by 5 levels. ([Inner passion] can only be used in stages. [Inner passion] is accrued when applied, but the unit abilities cannot increase to more than +100 level. This is activated even when units are in the Time Shop).
buffs.name: Inner Passion

hidden_abilites: When first appearing, movement speed and attack speed of allies increase significantly for a certain period of time. This also delays enemy skill casting.
Unit's attack range and movement speed increases by 5%, and attack power, attack range, and critical hit rate of all units increase by 5%.
Does not freeze due to cold attacks.
Normal attacks paralyze enemies for a longer time, and they ricochet to attack more enemies.
Inner Passion limit break: Inner passion max increases by 5 per Senior Sylphid. (However, this value cannot exceed 50.)
description.skill2: Increase HP of elf unit in PvP (0%, 0%, 5%, 10%, 20%)
description.skill3: Awakens the hidden special ability of [ Senior Sylphid ]
